name: MooniacRescue
description:
In a future Earth, with almost no resources, the last hope is a little robot called B.O.B. sent to the Moon a while ago. Now it is time for L.A.R.R.Y. to go get him, and retrieve the information that might give us the help we need.

<< PLAY IN FULL SCREEN FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE >>

Known issues: After finishing a game, if you want to play again please refresh the page.
